channel.title: Crptography on live life to the fullest.

item.title: Crptography 暗号
item.description: 対称暗号 非対称暗号 One-Way Hash Algorithm Type Spec MD5 Block 128bit hash. SHA-1 Block 160bit outout SHA-2 Stream used in WEP SHA-256 Stream used in WPA2 RIPEMD Password Hash Algorithm Type Spec LM hash — max 14 chars UPPERCASE only NT hash — max 127 charss mixed case Symmetric Algorithm Algorithm Type Spec DES Block 56bit key used in LM Hash password. 3DES Block 128bit key RC4 Stream used in WEP AES Stream used
